TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: ESA Moon Challenge- Simulations

Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/d20fbf85ecd92526c094206d1e52bcfa/tumblr_inline_nxmfu2uiem1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-embed tmblr-full" data-provider="youtube" data-orig-width="540" data-orig-height="304" data-url="https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DtWMnalXwrJM%26index%3D1%26list%3DPLo_VRCrgH2l_TGlshBvHdBj4TFep3WJVH"><iframe width="540" height="304" id="youtube_iframe" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tWMnalXwrJM?feature=oembed&enablejsapi=1&origin=https://safe.txmblr.com&wmode=opaque" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe></figure><p>This channel is full of simulation videos of different teams that are participating in the Challenge, some of them use #KSP for the visualization of their mission. You can vote for your favorite one by liking it. Please don’t vote only for KSP ones we don’t have a favorite, all of them are awesome!.<br/></p>

How do I get the video to play? The loading bar progresses and the play/pause icons seem to work normally, but it just doesn't actually play. Am I missing a plugin or something? Or just not pressing the right buttons or using the right fuel?

2015

http://spaceflight.esa.int/esamoonchallenge/

15 Sep Kick-off presentation.

14 Oct Letter of intent.

02 Nov Submission of deliverables.

16 Nov Selection and results.

15-16 Dec Presentation day for the 3 finalists.

Tried clicking on the youtube logo?

I got it sorted, thanks for the suggestion. It worked fine on my phone and pc, but not my tablet. I have no YouTube logo either, but on clicking the image on my tablet in various places I discovered that the top left corner, where the title is, opens it up in YouTube. A bit odd, but hey it works now:)

Thanks for the help.
